content.text: I'm from the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.
Ah, I see. I'm from the Midwest too! I miss it sometimes, but I like living in the city.
I'm sure it's nice to be close to family. I have a lot of friends in the city, but I don't get to see my family very often.
I know what you mean. I try to go back home as often as I can, but it's not always easy.
I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister. What are your passions?
I like to climb and I'm passionate about animal welfare. What do you like to do?
That's really cool! I've never been climbing before, but I've always wanted to try it. I love animals too! I have a parrot named Todd.
Todd sounds like a great companion. I'm glad you have him to keep you company.
Yes, I'm really lucky to have him. He's a great listener!
What's your favorite thing about living in the city?
I love the convenience of being able to walk or take public transportation everywhere. I also love the diversity of the city.
I definitely agree about the diversity. That's one of my favorite things about living here too.
It's really great to be able to meet people from all over the world
